body.p:
Owenton Ky Apl 24th/64
Hon. Thos E Bramlett
Dear Sir.

Enclosed please find the indictment agst T. P. Herndon for murder at the suggestion of a lawyer of our place I have placed the seal of the Court upon it, thinking perhaps you may wish it used in another State -- Mr. Threckeld informs me that he has made an arrangement with David Cowder Esqr. Deputy Marshall of Owenton, to go after Herndon and desires me to recommend him to you as one suitable to be Entrusted with such business -- I am and have been for 15 or 20 years well acquainted with Mr. Cowder, and take great pleasure in recommending him as a Gentleman, and one who Can be relied upon to transact any business

Resptly
W H Sandford Clk of Owen Circuit Court
